entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 1:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers this evening then to flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
